ABOUT_APPDB_DESC:
appdb is an App Marketplace (Store, Platform) for Apple devices. With appdb, users can discover apps that are beyond Apple's walled ecosystem and enjoy real freedom on devices they own.

Officially registered developers can use appdb to publish and distribute their apps without restrictions previously set by Apple.

Users and Developers can enjoy APIs replacements that were made by appdb - driving markets and competition further with much less commissions, cheaper apps, in-app purchases and subscriptions.

appdb is not affiliated with Apple and does not seek to undermine Apple's business practices. Users have the complete freedom to choose any software distribution system or marketplace they prefer.

appdb is located in Europe and acts under the European Union Digital Market Act, which gives us permission to exist despite Apple's requirements for marketplaces.

It is strongly recommended to use appdb with your own paid Apple Developer Account purchased directly from Apple.

appdb prioritizes your privacy, security, and safety. Our systems, APIs, and services are designed with your well-being in mind, enabling us to serve millions of users for over a decade without any incidents related to user data.

Join the bright side!

EMPIRE_STRIKES_BACK_DESC_1:
The drama behind AA well explained

In 2013 Freddy (AA developer) met Zorro, an AA app developer in Skype. Then Zorro showed Freddy an UK Guy, iChr0nix and his website on Joomla - the new app database, that used Joomla and looked as recently dead AppTrackr. Freddy said that it is not an option and we need to develop new website looking exactly like appstore (because users know it) and new app.

And then, in February 2013 we have launched AA. It took 3 weeks of Freddy's life to make it. Since 2013 we were constantly improving AA and you received such awesome features as TRACKS and DirectInstaller.

Also, in 2013, Apple has changed it's developer center, and ichr0nix's software that was on regmyudid.com became broken. He asked Freddy to code new one, and Freddy did it. From 2013, regmyudid.com is using Freddy's software to register UDIDs of devices and provide .provision files to users

We decided to split revenue 50/50 and it was true agreement, because Freddy received ~8K GBP from it

In 2013, we have made over 50K GBP from UDID registrations, and most of these money still in payment gateways, because ichr0nix can't make bank account four such *specific* business for one and half years

There was also Zorro, he offered to make resigning service, integrated with AA, and with his help and Freddy's skills we have made it (and you know it - it was isigncloud).

After Zorro joined RMU business, we have split as 40/40/20 to Freddy, iChr0nix and Zorro accordingly

We have also met in Prague, and it was quite funny:
EMPIRE_STRIKES_BACK_DESC_2:
The conflict

Everything was perfect. Freddy was for infrastructure and AA website development, iChr0nix was for public relations and billing, Zorro was for iOS app. But, Freddy was annoyed about bank account. Really, how long it takes to make bank account for a company in UK? Seems like he annoyed iChr0nix too, so he disabled services. That made Freddy angry, he moved database to his own servers (remember that drama with appaddict.cc?) and have not told this to iChr0nix.

We agreed to do not turn off services just because of our wish and followed this rule, but not so much as expected.

In last month, when Freddy was in depression and unavalible, iChr0nix disabled servers one more time. And it was last notice to Freddy. It is not acceptable for serious projects. Also iChr0nix was noticed that database was on Freddy's server and he paid for expensive DB server to no purpose. This fact made him angry too.

So it was last major conflict when AA was down for couple days, but we finally agreed to do not act like this in future.

And in October, iChr0nix and Zorro decided to silently kick Freddy out without any notice. They deleted his accounts on AA and revoked his security keys and simply said nothing to him.

In fact, RMU owns approximately 70K GBP and iChr0nix still owes Freddy approximately 15K GBP.
EMPIRE_STRIKES_BACK_DESC_3:
The power of code

*At least* dissapointed with such decisions of persons that Freddy threated as Friends, Freddy decided to create {{brand}}. (and you are reading this article here)

He published AA and RMU source code under Public Domain license here and made relatively new project named {{brand}}. It does not require iOS App (because Freddy have no permission to use Zorro's products), it works directly from browser and via official Apple Protocols and integrates app resigining and installtion in one simple button "INSTALL"

Code that powers {{brand}} was also developed by Freddy, the same as AA. But, seems like AA will no longer be developed or maintained by Freddy. Use it at your own risk.

The silent revenge with cold blood

Since Freddy kicked from AA, he did a security research on his own software and find some security issues that he used to disable AA. That's why future use of AA is risky, because no one except Freddy can fix discovered security vulnerabilities.
EMPIRE_STRIKES_BACK_DESC_4:
Freddy hacked AA in same night and watched how is it going. And on launch of {{brand}}, he disabled it.

iChr0nix and Zorro were unable to bring AA back for 3 weeks, because it is too complex, obviously. They have hired Freelancer (Katrina, a woman), that costs them ~40GBP per hour. It's a shame.

Instead of trying to resolve this most massive conflict in AA life, iChr0nix began to post shit in Twitter about that {{brand}} can wipe your device, Freddy is theif, etc (and of course it is not true). This war was continuous, but everything sometimes comes to an end.

On 1st of November, iCr0nix called Freddy and apologised for everything he has done. We have agreed to move in two separate ways, AA on its own, {{brand}} on its own.

So now, only Zorro, Katrina and iChr0nix are maintaining AA. There are also dkbame and crackalicious as an admins. That's all. Nobody else left on AA.

And finally, {{brand}} is the new home for those who used AA. It was made by original AA creator and will be continuously improved. Thank you for reading and you're welcome here!
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_2:
Developer account reseller program

Personal apple developer accounts are required to install apps to non-jailbroken devices, that's how apple made it. {{brand}} buys such accounts on funds that we've earned from PRO sales and shares these accounts with newly activated PROs.

As {{brand}} is one of the largest websites since apptrackr and appaddict died, we simply has no so much people and we can't afford lots of people who will register developer accounts on mass scale that you ({{brand}} users) demand. That's why we decided to open yet another program - Personal apple developer account program

What is it?

It is fully featured program that will help you to earn some money and help another users on {{brand}} to use apps on non-jailbroken devices. The idea is the following:

  • You can buy developer account and give it to {{brand}}
  • {{brand}} will use it to activate PROs and pay {{pricePerDevice}} EUR per device activation to you. You can withdraw funds as soon as you reach 15 EUR.

Sounds simple? It is simple and, we hope, will solve most problems and will strengthen the community
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_3:
Is it legal?

Yes. {{brand}} has consulted with local lawyers in different countries and the only thing you violate is section 3.2 (f) of apple developer agreement.

3.2 (f) You will not, directly or indirectly, commit any act intended to interfere with the Apple Software or Services, the intent of this Agreement, or Apple’s business practices including, but not limited to, taking actions that may hinder the performance or intended use of the App Store, Custom App Distribution, or the Program (e.g., submitting fraudulent reviews of Your own Application or any third party application, choosing a name for Your Application that is substantially similar to the name of a third party application in order to create consumer confusion, or squatting on application names to prevent legitimate third party use). Further, You will not engage, or encourage others to engage, in any unlawful, unfair, misleading, fraudulent, improper, or dishonest acts or business practices relating to Your Covered Products (e.g., engaging in bait- and-switch pricing, consumer misrepresentation, deceptive business practices, or unfair competition against other developers);

As you see, it is contract between you and company, it covers only developer part of relationship with you and apple, nothing more. Your Apple account, iCloud or any other part of apple ecosystem that does not belong to developer portal is not affected.

Is it private?

Yes. {{brand}} never shares developer account information to anyone and not providing cryptographic identities that can identify you or your devices.
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_4:
What's my benefit?

  • Guaranteed 100% ROI within a month, if your account won't be revoked by Apple because it was registered without legitimate Bank Card or ID. You can request full account price payout since one month passed from addition date, even if {{brand}} is not using it yet.
  • Furthermore, around 150-200% ROI when you account will be used by {{brand}} (depends of user demand on PRO activations). Developer accounts costs around 100 EUR, it can contain up to 400 devices. However, due to {{brand}}'s randomness in account selection, usually it is filled with 100-200 devices.
  • 24-h payouts to your PayPal or Bitcoin address.

Does country of account matter?

No. Developer account can be registered in any country.
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_5:
How to participate in this?

We have developed algorithm that you should follow:

Prerequisites:

  1. Apple device (that supports 2 factor auth (iOS 9 or later, OS X El Capitan or later))
  2. A valid mobile phone number that can receive SMS or call
  3. A valid credit card with apple developer account cost balance (around 100 EUR, you will see exact amount during enrollment)

What to do?

If you are U.S. resident (short way)

  1. Register new Apple account with your real data at Apple account website. It's important to use separate Apple account, as you will give away this account to {{brand}}. You will need to confirm your phone number, but don't worry, we will remove it from account when it will be added to {{brand}}.
  2. Logout from iCloud on your device
  3. Log in to iCloud on your device with freshly created Apple account. Chose not to merge data.
  4. Download Apple Developer App from AppStore with your new freshly created Apple account
  5. Open it and tap "Enroll Now", tap "Sign with Apple account" and chose your fresh Apple account
  6. Follow instructions to enroll as Individual / Sole proprietor. That's it!
  7. Wait for activation emails, they should state "Welcome to Apple Developer program", "Welcome to AppStore connect". Usually it takes couple hours. Please do not remove these messages from mailbox as they are automatically verified by our systems.
  8. Log out from all your devices with this account
  9. It's done! Now you have personal apple developer account that you can use in developer account reseller program
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_6:
Other countries (long way)

  1. Register new Apple account with your real data at Apple account website . It's important to use separate Apple account, as you will give away this account to {{brand}}. You will need to confirm your phone number, but don't worry, we will remove it from account when it will be added to {{brand}}.
  2. On your iOS device, go to Settings->Passwords & Accounts->Add Account->iCloud and add your freshly created Apple account, accept iCloud Terms & Conditions and uncheck all syncing options like Contacts or Reminders. You just need it to receive 2FA codes to your device, nothing more.
  3. Go to {{devPortalLink}} - apple developer portal. Log in, Agree with terms, Click "Join Apple Developer program".
  4. Fill in the form, go further until you will see entity type selection select "Individual / Sole proprietor".
  5. Proceed to payment and pay for it. Don't forget to turn automatic renewal off if Apple offers you to turn it on.
  6. Wait for activation emails, they should state "Welcome to Apple Developer program", "Welcome to AppStore connect". Usually it takes couple hours. Please do not remove these messages from mailbox as they are automatically verified by our systems.
  7. Log out from all your devices with this account
  8. It's done! Now you have personal apple developer account that you can use in developer account reseller program
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_7:
Personal information notice

Apple may ask you to provide your ID. Only Apple has access to this data, you submit your documents via secure app or apple website. {{brand}} never has access to your ID or information, it is covered in Apple Privacy Policy. Apple do not share such information with any 3rd party.

You should have this data at the end:

  1. Email address of Apple account
  2. Password to email
  3. Password to Apple account
  4. A device that can receive 2FA codes for this account

Now you can submit your account to {{brand}}. Once submitted, {{brand}} representative will contact you in order to verify your account and remove your private information, your device and mobile phone number from it.
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_8:
FAQ

  • I see "Enrollment could not be completed at this time" on Apple developer website - try again in a little while. Make sure that you have added account to your device on step 2 of manual
  • I see "Your request could not be completed at this time" on Apple developer website - IP address of a country and country of your apple developer account and freshly created Apple account must match. Do not use VPN

Once you have finished all these steps and have required information, you can go ahead and Create {{brand}} staff account to access {{brand}}'s Personal Developer Account reseller program. Do not use Apple account email that you created as your {{brand}} account email!
RESELLER_PROGRAM_DESC_9:
{{brand}}'s referral program

Paid to referrers so far: {{paidToRefs}} EUR

In January 2021 we have launched updated referral program, when everyone can refer friends to {{brand}} and will get {{paymentPlusForRef}} EUR per PLUS referral or {{paymentForRef}} EUR per PRO referral. It is simple - just copy and send special link from Staff Area to your friends, they will obtain PLUS or PRO and you will get {{paymentPlusForRef}} EUR or {{paymentForRef}} EUR accordingly.
And yes, you can refer yourself, so it will be some kind of discount for your next PLUS/PRO purchase. Payouts are made via PayPal or Bitcoin.



{{brand}}'s staff support program

Gifted: {{paidToStaff}} EUR

{{brand}} supports it's uploaders by providing iTunes Gift cards, so they can experience and share apps for testing with others.



Requests fulfilment fund

Spent on automatic requests fulfilment: {{spentOnRequests}} EUR

{{brand}} has automatic requests fulfilment fund in order to process Automatic app requests and let uploaders to find and upload content faster. Each PRO purchase shares some amount of money with this fund. However, it can not be more than 0.4 of Staff Support Program Fund.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE_DESC_6:
DMG Image

Any submitted .dmg images that have had the Backgrounds modified to contain any links to another resources are strictly not allowed and will be deleted straight away. This is to avoid people advertising on their submissions.

Advertising Instant Ban and IP Block

{{brand}} will not stand for any form of advertising on our website. This includes adding URLs, domains, twitter accounts, or Company Names etc., except the Provider name you can add into the file name or link. We are very strict on this so please abide by this.

Text File Links

People try to be clever and upload links to txt files pointing to IPA’s or DMG’s hosted elsewhere please don’t do this you will be caught and banned instantly.

File Hosts We Accept

As an uploader you agree that you will only upload to file hosts that we have pre approved. All apps are moderated once uploaded so we will delete any links to hosts we have not pre approved and you run the risk of being banned from {{brand}}

To be accepted as a file host on {{brand}} you must comply with all of the following requirements:
1) – Offer free downloads as well as premium downloads
2) – Provide a reasonable speed on free downloads at least 40 kb/s
3) - No SURVEYS or QUIZZES of any sort!
4) - Standard wait times should be no longer than 120 seconds
5) – No deliberate malicious content should be inflicted upon users

If you would like to apply for your file host to be placed on our whitelist please contact us ({{brand}}|at|protonmail|dot|com) and we will be happy to review your service.

The information contained in this web site is subject to change without notice.

PRO_IS_PENDING_APPLE_WAIT: Your PRO is active, but Apple will make a decision about allowance to use it within 24-72 hours, Please wait. We have checked this last time at {{last_checked_apple}}

PLUS_STATUS_FOR_DEVICE: PLUS activation status for the selected device:
PLUS_PROVIDED_BY: PLUS status for this device is provided by
PLUS_FEATURES_DESC:
{{brand}} PLUS allows you to use {{brand}} on non-jailbroken device or Apple Silicon Mac with your own developer account and sign apps in the cloud without any limitations

PLUS is activated per device, separately for each of your devices

We use this money to pay for servers, traffic, and support the community, as {{brand}} does not contain ads

PLUS is not transferable between devices, you can cancel it at any time, or we will notify your about existing subscription for unlinked device, so you can cancel it if you sold your device

Completed purchases are final and not refundable, as features activation is immediate

DELETE_FREE_DEV_ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete your free Apple Developer account?

CHOOSE_WHAT_TO_OBTAIN: Please choose what you want to obtain:
DISCUSSION_NOTICE: In order to post an app review, please install this app on your device
MANDATORY_RECONFIGURATION_NOTE: This date is set by Apple. If you don't reconfigure your account by this date, your apps will stop to work.
PLUS_PRIVACY_HINT: {{brand}} never stores or shares your password. It is required only during configuration. Privacy Policy
AGE_RESTRICTED_CONTENT_ALERT: This content is age-restricted, as it may be related to porn, gambling or drug reference. If you are not legally allowed to view it, please leave this page immediately
IDENTITY_TYPE_TO_USE_FOR_SIGNING: Identity type to use for signing
APPLE_LIMITATION_NOTE: *all sales are final, no refunds will be issued! Can be limited by Apple right after activation for up to {{days}} days. Limitation may be extended further if PRO was revoked while it was limited. Instead of refund, free upgrade to {{brand}} PLUS is offered
DEV_ACCOUNT_SHARE_PROMPT: Warning! Sharing of your own developer account will automatically allow devices of your friend to be registered in it and used to install apps to their devices. Your friend won't have access to Apple account or any credentials. Please enter email of your friend:
DEV_ACCOUNT_SHARE_REMOVAL_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to stop sharing account with {{email}}?
DELETE_PLUS_DEV_ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure? All account data will be cleared and you (and your friends, if any) will no longer be able to sign apps in the cloud
PLUS_SWITCH_WARNING: Apple can limit your PRO for up to {{days}} days after activation. Frequent revokes! We strongly recommend you to obtain your own developer account directly from Apple to avoid revokes
CREATE_STAFF_ACCOUNT_TO_CONTINUE: Create appdb staff account to participate in this program
ENTER_VERSION: Enter version number in the same format as you see in AppStore
PRO_REFUND_CONFIRMATION: Your PRO will be voided and unused time will be refunded
PRO_REFUND_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your PRO has been voided and refund request has been placed. We strongly recommend you to switch to your own Developer Account purchased from Apple to avoid revocations and limitations
ELIGIBLE_FOR_PRO_REFUND: You are eligible for refund for pending or revoked PRO of {{refundAmount}} EUR. We strongly recommend you to switch to your own Developer Account purchased from Apple to avoid revocations and limitations
NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_PRO_REFUND: You are not eligible for PRO refund. Instead of refund, free upgrade to {{brand}} PLUS is offered
PRO_SALES_STOPPED_TITLE: You can not obtain {{brand}} PRO anymore
PRO_SALES_STOPPED_NOTICE:
We care a lot about our community. As usage of PROs has became extremely unstable due to frequent revocations, we have stopped {{brand}} PRO program, it is not available for new users anymore. Existing PROs will continue to work until their expiration and will be reactivated in case of revocations, if there will be shared accounts available. If not, PRO will be freely upgraded to PLUS.

{{brand}} PLUS is optional subscription that helps us to maintain {{brand}} and keep it ad-free, pay for servers and traffic. If you feel generous and want to support {{brand}}, please obtain {{brand}} PLUS
PLUS_STEP_1: Purchase Developer Membership directly from Apple
PLUS_STEP_3: Obtain {{brand}} PLUS. This is optional
BUY_PLUS_TITLE: {{brand}} PLUS - install apps to non-jailbroken devices without limits
PLUS_DOWNLOAD_APP:
- Download Apple Developer App
- Login with your Apple account
- Tap "Enroll now" and purchase Apple Membership as Individual
- Wait for activation emails
- Proceed to next step

One account can be used for all your current and future devices and can be securely shared with your family or friends. You can reimburse price of this account by securely listing it on P2P marketplace.
CONFIGURE_SUMMARY_DESC: On this page you can configure features that {{brand}} will use for your device
INSTALL_APPS_WITH_FREE_DEV_ACCOUNT: Install apps with free Apple Developer account
IMPORT_DEV_CREDENTIALS_PROVIDER_CONFIRMA: Your device hardware identifier will be shared with this provider, tap OK to continue
INTEGRATE_EASY_LINKING_NOTICE: Selling certificates? Integrate via API! View documentation
PLEASE_PROVIDE_URL_TO_IPA: Please provide URL to IPA file, it must to be available for direct download
NO_REPOS_FOUND: You haven't imported any repositories yet
MY_REPOS_MOBILE_INSTRUCTION: Click on any of the repositories below to browse it
NO_NEWS_IN_REPO: No news in this repository yet
NO_APPS_IN_REPO: No apps in this repository yet
NO_REPO_APP_DOWNLOAD_LINK: Oops! No links yet for actual version
NO_APP_IN_REPO_ERROR: We were unable to find such content in current repository
SEARCHING_FOR_PRIVATE_REPOS: Searching for your own collection of repositories? Go to your repositories
SEARCHING_FOR_PUBLIC_REPOS: Searching for public repositories? Go to public repositories
LINK_TO_ADD_REPO: You can not add repositories unless you link your device. Do you want to link your device now?
MAKE_REPO_PUBLIC_CONFIRM: You will make this repository publicly visible for everyone in Repositories section of {{brand}}. You can hide it later if you want to
FREE_SIGNINIG_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE:
Not available at the moment.
You can help and share such certificate
DISABLE_REVOCATION_CHECKS_DESC: Disable revocation checks (UNSAFE), in case of installing revoked app, it may be cached till you will reset your device
MY_DYLIBS_DESC:
Here you can upload or import dynamic libraries, frameworks or debian packages or ZIP archives with tweaks to inject into apps that you are installing via {{brand}}. Uploading or importing of any file will enable “Ask for Installation Options” feature for current device, so you can choose what tweaks you want to include in the app. You can disable this option later on device features configuration page.

Please note that not all packages, dylibs or frameworks that were built for jailbroken devices will work on your non-jailbroken devices
PROVIDE_URL_TO_DYLIB: Please provide URL to file, it must to be available for direct download
PLUS_DESCRIPTION: PLUS will unlock advanced {{brand}} features such as removal of signing limits and bigger App Library. This is optional and does not give you an ability to install apps. To do this, you must complete necessary steps written above
PREMIUM_DESCRIPTION: PREMIUM will allow you to install apps from appdb and additionally unlock advanced {{brand}} features such as removal of signing limits and bigger App Library. Device activation may be delayed for up to a week. All sales are final.
SIDELOADING_OPTIONS_TIP: Click on any option to purchase. By purchasing you agree with Purchase terms.
OFFICIAL_SIDELOADING_HEADING: With your own paid Apple Developer account
FREE_DEVELOPER_SIDELOADING_HEADING: Sideloading with free developer certificate (free, limited to 3 apps, PC required, lasts for week)
FREE_DEVELOPER_SIDELOADING_DESC: You can just download apps from {{brand}} by following links (not by tapping install buttons) and installing them manually via PC and software like AltStore or Sideloadly
THIS_FEATURE_IS_PART_OF_PLUS: This feature is part of {{brand}} PLUS
PLEASE_WAIT_N_SECONDS_TILL_LINK: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds for link to appear
LINK_IS_READY_CONTINUE: Your link is ready! Click or tap here to continue
YOU_DONT_NEED_P2P_CERTIFICATE:
Somebody shared their developer account with you. You don’t need to use this feature. However, you can buy replacement from someone else, offers are displayed below.
Please keep in mind that in case of new P2P purchase, old account owner will still be able to ban your device in case of chargeback, as your device will still be registered in their account till it expires
NAME: Name
P2P_CERTIFICATE_BUY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Your device identifier will be shared with this person and your device will be registered in his/her account. Please note that you are paying directly to this person and {{brand}} is not responsible for their actions after payment has been made
P2P_ACCOUNT_STATUS_NOT_OK:
You can not use P2P to sell places in your own developer account at the moment, as it is not in OK status, please check what’s wrong with it at Apple developer account configuration page.
If you are trying to buy an ability to sign and install apps from someone via P2P, remove your own account from {{brand}} at Apple developer account configuration page
P2P_SETTINGS_LEGAL_TEXT:
Enabling of P2P sales for your own developer account will allow others to purchase slots in your developer account, so you can get developer account price back and help others.
We have limited amount of registered devices (including yours or/and registered by you via other software like xCode) to {{devicesLimit}} (based on our experience), so Apple won't revoke it. However, we can not guarantee full revocation safety, as Apple may change rules at any time without any notice.

Payments are going directly to you via PayPal or other manual payment method, {{brand}} does not take any commission or responsibility. Once somebody made a purchase, you must to keep your account in OK status and reply to {{brand}} or your buyer emails within 48 hours.

Ability to sign apps on your account will be securely shared with one device of a buyer. Buyer won't have access to your account or any credentials of your account, including certificates, everything will work securely via {{brand}}. We will also share your email address with the buyer, so they can contact you in case of issues.

You won't be able to remove your account from {{brand}} unless all P2P registrations will expire.

We recommend you to set price per one device around $5-10, please don't be greedy. Sharing is caring, {{brand}} is built on top of this idea.

In case of inability to contact you via your email address, we may force device registration of person that will provide evidences of payment to you via our support desk, or/and permanently remove your account from P2P marketplace due to violation of these rules.
Last updated: 30 Nov 2023
NOTHING_WAS_FOUND: Nothing was found... continue search the universe or try again in a little while
P2P_PURCHASE_BAN_WARNING: Warning! You can ban this device in case of fraudulent actions from the device owner like inappropriate chargeback. Each ban will be examined by {{brand}} team. Please enter the reason for the ban to continue
P2P_SIGNING_MARKETPLACE: Install apps with P2P shared Apple Developer account
P2P_SIGNING_MARKETPLACE_DESC:
Here you can buy an ability to install apps directly from other people, it will be shared with you securely by account owner. This will help account owner to reimburse costs (approximately $99 per year) of owning of such account and make everyone happy.

  • There is no {{brand}} commission
  • Payment goes directly to account owner
  • You are purchasing ability to install apps for one device
  • Duration of ability to install apps may vary depending on developer membership expiration of account
  • You may need to reinstall your apps once (as some credentials may expire during active developer membership)
  • You will get contact information of account owner after purchase
  • {{brand}} or account owner does not provide signing certificates and provisioning profiles or any passwords separately, everything is working securely and under the hood only on {{brand}}
  • {{brand}} is not responsible for actions of account owner. If account owner acts incorrectly, please create ticket in support desk, it can be found on my billing page
  • According to Apple's restrictions, you may have to wait for up to 33 days, this is normal and can not be fixed
P2P_OFFERS_REINSTALL_DATE_DESC: Some offers contain developer accounts that may need to be reconfigured on specific date. It will result in requirement of one time all apps removal and installation. But don't worry, you can reinstall your apps from your installation history
P2P_PURCHASE_BAN_SUCCESS: Device was successfully banned. This case will be examined by {{brand}} team
P2P_CONFIGURATION_SUCCESS: Your settings for P2P sale of your Apple developer account slots were saved successfully
P2P_PURCHASE_RESULT: We are waiting for response from payment gateway
P2P_PURCHASE_CHECK_STATUS: If your purchase was successful, you can check status of ability to sign apps and get contact of person that shared it with you on Apple developer account configuration page
P2P_STEP_1: Buy a place (slot) from someone in their officially purchased Apple Developer account at P2P signing marketplace, then you will be able start to sign and install apps via {{brand}}
FREE_ENTERPRISE_SIDELOADING_DESC: Just tap INSTALL buttons to sideload with free, community-provided certificate (when available). Apple will surely blacklist your device or certificate will be revoked, resulting in your apps crashing or failing to launch with "Unable to verify" error. Then you need to wait till new one will be available or switch to other stable sideloading methods listed here
3RD_PARTY_SIDELOADING_DESC: Buy appdb+certificate bundle from any of supported partners, then import their certificate automatically at Device features configuration page
OTHER_PLUS_DEVICES_LINKED_WITH_EMAIL: Other devices with PLUS linked to {{brand}} with email "{{email}}"
SITE_DESCRIPTION: The biggest independent app store (marketplace) for iOS, iPadOS and MacOS. Publish your apps for free independently. Install apps that you want securely and privately. Install and download iOS, iPadOS, MacOS apps and games
SITE_KEYWORDS: appdb, app store, AppStore, iOS, iPadOS, independent, trusted, security, privacy, sideload, sideloading, EU, EU DMA, DMA, Digital Market Act, download, free, official, macOS, iPhone, iPad
P2P_CURRENCY_HINT: If your currency is not listed here, you can request it to be added via support desk
P2P_PAYPAL_HINT: Make sure that you have a verified PayPal account and provided necessary ID documents, otherwise payment may be put on hold by PayPal which will result in inconveniences for the buyer and for you
P2P_MANUAL_INSTRUCTIONS_HINT: If you have no access to PayPal, please write manual instructions on how to transfer money to you. You can specify bank account details, crypto address or something else. These instructions will be shown to the buyer. Make sure that your email address {{email}} is accessible, as you will be notified once the buyer will mark payment as completed
YOU_ARE_ABOUT_TO_BUY_DEV_CERT: You are about to buy a sideloading ability for your device from {{name}}. Please transfer {{amount}} {{currency}} to them
P2P_PAYMENT_CONFIRMATION_DESC:
You confirm that you:
- Agree with P2P terms and conditions
- Already made a payment

Account owner will be notified and they may approve or reject it in case of non-payment.

In case of 3 rejections from different account owners your device will be automatically banned
P2P_PAYMENT_CONFIRMATION_REQUEST_SUCCESS: You have successfully marked your payment as completed. We have sent you contacts of developer account owner and notified they about your payment. Please wait for their response. You will be notified via email. Usually it takes less than 24 hours
P2P_PURCHASE_APPROVAL_CONFIRMATION:
You are about to confirm that payment was received.

Please approve device registration only after payment was received, please double-check that you received payment!

This will allow the device to be registered in your developer account
P2P_PURCHASE_REJECTION_CONFIRMATION: You are about to confirm that payment was NOT received. Buyer will be notified and may try to contact you via email. You may approve this payment later
P2P_PENDING_STATUS_DESCRIPTION: You have marked your payment as completed. Please wait for developer account owner response. Details of developer account owner can be found on Apple developer account configuration page
P2P_REJECTED_STATUS_DESCRIPTION: Developer account owner has REJECTED your purchase. Please contact them to resolve this issue or purchase ability to sign from someone else. Details of developer account owner can be found on Apple developer account configuration page
LINK_TO_SEE_DOWNLOAD_OPTIONS: Link your device to see community-provided installation and download options
REQUEST_SUPPORT_OR_SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLA: If you have an active PLUS subscription, request cancellation via Support Desk
HOW_TO_SIDELOAD_AND_USE_PLUS: How to sideload and use {{brand}} PLUS
3RD_PARTY_CERT_LINKED_TITLE: Certificate from 3rd party has been configured for your device successfully
3RD_PARTY_CERT_LINKED_BODY: Certificate from 3rd party has been configured successfully. Now you can install apps from {{brand}}. You can continue to device features configuration page or head straight to app installations
ERROR_REPO_BUNDLE_ID_IS_MISSING: Bundle Identifier of app is missing. Please ask repository owner to fix it's JSON metadata file
DO_NOT_USE_ICLOUD_APPLE_EMAILS: Do not use Apple-provided emails like @icloud.com, @me.com, @mac.com or similar. Use your own email address that is not registered by Apple
CHANGE_EMAIL_PAGE_DESC:
If you want to change email, you can do it here. In case if there are other devices linked under your new email:

  • You can manage all your devices linked under one email
  • IPA libraries will be merged
  • Tweaks libraries will be merged
  • Repositories will be merged

All other features, like {{brand}} PLUS, attached developer account or certificate, P2P purchase or installation history will stay intact and will be transferred to your new email address. If your friend or relative have shared their Apple developer account with you, you need to ask them to remove your old email from sharing list at Apple developer account configuration page and add your new email
ENTER_CODE_SENT_TO_NEW_EMAIL: Enter the verification code sent to your new email
THIS_DEVICE_IS_LINKED_TO_APPDB: These devices are linked to {{brand}} under email "{{email}}" (change):
THIS_COMPUTER_IS_LINKED_TO_APPDB: This PC/Mac is linked to {{brand}} with email {{email}} (change) and able to control these devices:
EMAIL_CHANGE_SUCCESS_BODY: You have successfully changed email associated with your devices
PLUS_DEV_ACCOUNT_FIRST_CONFIGURE_CONFIRM: Have you bought an Apple developer account from Apple and paid around $99 to Apple and got emails from Apple stating that developer membership for you was activated?
COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience. Learn More...
COPYRIGHT_CLAIM_NOTICE: This content is not available because of copyright infringement. Claim was sent by a party displayed below

CLICK_TO_LINK_TV: Click here to link Apple TV if you have no other Apple device.
APPLE_TV_WAS_LINKED: Your Apple TV was linked to {{brand}}
INSTALLATION_HISTORY_DESC: Here you can see installation history for all your devices and reinstall apps if necessary. For official apps, only the latest available version may be reinstalled

INSTALL_CONFIGURE_YOUR_DEV_ACCOUNT_PLUS: Install apps with paid Apple Developer account
INSTALL_CONFIGURE_YOUR_FREE_DEV_ACCOUNT: Install apps with free Apple Developer account
INSTALL_CONFIGURE_3RD_PARTY_CERTIFICATE: Install apps with paid 3rd party certificate
P2P_SIGNING_MARKETPLACE_MENU_TITLE: Buy an ability to install apps from someone else
INSTALL_APPS_WITH_DEV_ACCOUNT: Install apps with paid Apple Developer account
DEV_ACCOUNT_PAGE_SIDEBAR:
This is the recommended way to use {{brand}}.

Unfortunately Apple Inc requires you to pay them $8.25 (EUR) per month in order to install apps outside their app store.

Here you can link your paid apple developer account to {{brand}} and securely share an ability to install apps with your family or friends. Only one apple developer account is required for all your devices, devices of your family or friends, you need to configure it once on your main device.

{{brand}} never stores your password. You will see login attempt from California, USA. This is normal, please accept it.
FREE_DEV_ACCOUNT_PAGE_SIDEBAR:
Unfortunately Apple Inc requires you to pay them $8.25 (EUR) per month in order to install apps outside their app store, if you don't want to pay, you can use your free apple developer account.

Here you can link your free apple developer account to {{brand}} and install up to 3 apps to your devices. To do more, choose better app installation method.

{{brand}} never stores your password. You will see login attempt from California, USA. This is normal, please accept it.
YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_PLUS: You already have PLUS for this device. You can manage your subscription on my billing page
YOU_WILL_BE_REDIRECTED_TO_DEVICES_PAGE: You will be redirected to your devices page, where you can switch to another device or link correct one
STORAGE_FOR_IPA_LIBRARY_FOOTNOTE: per device. If you have activated PREMIUM or PLUS for more than one device, storage will be multiplied

OFFICIAL_APP_DOWNLOAD_NOTICE: Notice: Downloaded apps can be installed to your device in accordance with app installation method that you chosen. If you manually install this app to your device instead of installation directly from {{brand}}, features that are provided by {{brand}} may not work.

TO_ENABLE_JIT_VISIT_FROM_DEVICE: To enable JIT, please visit {{brand}} from your {{device}}
TO_CONFIGURE_FREE_ACCOUNT_VISIT_FROM_DEV: To configure free Apple Developer account, please visit {{brand}} from your {{device}}

USE_APPDB_TOOLS_TO_SWITCH_TO_MAC: To switch to your Mac, please open appdb tools on your Mac and click "Authorize yourbrowser" button
CAN_BE_USED_ONLY_DIRECTLY_NOTICE: You can use {{brand}} only from this device directly. You can not control it via your other devices
LINK_MAC_VIA_HELPER_DESCRIPTION: You can link your Apple Silicon Mac to via appdb tools. Please download it here to link your Mac
LINK_AUTHORIZED: You have authorized another device successfully
NOTICE_SCAN_QR_CODE_THAT_IS_SHOWN_ON_COM: Please scan QR code that is shown on computer to authorize it to manage your app libraries or queue app installations to your Apple TV
SCAN_QR_TO_LINK_COMPUTER: Scan QR code from already linked device in order to link your computer
LINK_APPLE_SILICON_MAC_DESC: To link your Apple Silicon Mac and install apps to it use appdb tools
LINK_PC_DESC: To link your PC and manage your apps libraries click here.
LINK_IDEVICE_PRIOR_TO_LINKING_TV: To link your Apple TV, you need to link your any other Apple device first
MOBILE_DEVICE_PAIRING_FILE: Mobile device pairing file, required for JIT or free installations
ENABLE_JIT_PAGE_TITLE: Enable free app installations and JIT (Just In Time) compilation
ENABLE_JIT_TITLE: Enable free app installations and Just In Time Compilation
ENABLE_JIT_DESCRIPTION: Learn how to enable free app installations and JIT compilation for improved performance in emulators, games and virtualization apps on your iOS device.
ENABLE_JIT_INTRO: Enabling free app installations and enabling JIT (Just In Time compilation) gives significant boost of performance in Emulators, Games and other Virtualization apps. This feature is supported for mobile devices, running iOS/iPadOS 17.6 or newer.
ENABLE_JIT_STEP_1: Pair your device via computer and appdb JIT (mobile device) Pair or attach *.mobiledevicepairing manually at device features configuration page. You need to do it once
ENABLE_JIT_STEP_2: Install appdb Shortcut, it will be activated automatically
META_ENABLE_JIT_TITLE: Enable free app installations and JIT Compilation
META_ENABLE_JIT_DESCRIPTION: Learn how to enable free app installations and Just-In-Time compilation for significantly improved performance in emulators, games, and virtualization apps on your iOS device.
META_ENABLE_JIT_KEYWORDS: JIT compilation, iOS JIT, emulator performance, enable JIT, appdb JIT (mobile device) pair, iOS virtualization
CURRENT_DEVICE_CAN_USE_JIT_NOTICE: If you completed all steps, your device can use JIT. Just tap "Enable JIT" button during app installation or from Installation History.
JIT_INSTALL_NOTICE: If app is installed and you have opened it at least once, you can launch it with JIT support
JIT_DEVICE_NOT_CONFIGURED_WITH_LINK: This app supports JIT, but this device is not configured to use it yet. Enable JIT support for this device
DEVICE_CONNECT_JIT_REQUIREMENT: Please connect your device to {{brand}} in order to enable JIT
DEVICE_CONNECT_INSTALL_REQUIREMENT: Device needs to be connected to appdb in order to install apps
CONFIRM_CANCEL_INSTALL_SESSION: Are you sure to cancel app installation session? You will need to queue app installation again
CONFIRM_CANCEL_JIT_SESSION: Are you sure to cancel JIT session? You will need to queue app installation again
ERROR_CHECKING_JIT_STATUS: Error checking JIT status. Please try again.
CONFIRM_APP_INSTALLED: Have app installed to your device and opens?
YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_PREMIUM: You already have PREMIUM for this device. You can manage your subscription on my billing page
PREMIUM_FEATURES_DESC: {{brand}} PREMIUM provides all the benefits of PLUS with additional features like dedicated fast servers and no configuration required for app installation.
NO_CONFIGURATION_IS_REQUIRED: No configuration of app installation method is required
BEST_EFFORT_NOTICE: This is provided on best effort basis, we do not guarantee that it will work for all apps and devices, as we beleive that sideloading needs to be unrestricted
OFFICIAL_SIDELOADING_PRICE: 8.16 EUR per month for all your devices, billed annually, paid to Apple, not to us
OFFICIAL_SIDELOADING_BENEFITS: Supports unlimited amount of apps, no PC required, supports JIT
THIS_IS_THE_RECOMMENDED_WAY_TO_USE: This is the recommended way to use {{brand}}
THIS_IS_THE_RECOMMENDED_WAY_TO_USE_NO_AC: This is the recommended way to use {{brand}} without paying Apple
P2P_SIDELOADING_PRICE: Varies from 5 to 20 EUR up to a year per each device, depending on the offer at P2P marketplace
P2P_SIDELOADING_BENEFITS: Supports unlimited amount of apps, no PC required, supports JIT
P2P_SIDELOADING_DISADVANTAGES: You pay for each device, lasts less, when expires, app reinstallation is required
3RD_PARTY_SIDELOADING_PRICE: Varies from 10 to 30 EUR up to a year per each device, depending on certificate provider
3RD_PARTY_SIDELOADING_BENEFITS: Supports unlimited amount of apps, no PC required, supports JIT
3RD_PARTY_SIDELOADING_DISADVANTAGES: You pay for each device, lasts less, when expires, app reinstallation is required. Does not support all {{brand}} features in official apps
PREMIUM_CURRENTLY_UNAVAILABLE: Premium subscriptions are currently unavailable. Please check back later
PREMIUM_SIDELOADING_PRICE: Starting from 9.99 EUR per month per device
PREMIUM_SIDELOADING_BENEFITS: Supports unlimited amount of apps, no PC required, supports JIT, no configuration required. appdb warranty.
PREMIUM_SIDELOADING_DISADVANTAGES: You pay for each device, using shared developer account from other person
PREMIUM_STEP_1: Just buy a subscription and your device will be activated automatically.
SIDELOADING_NOTICE:
To install apps from appdb, you need to configure an app installation method. It can be Your own developer account, appdb PREMIUM, Free Apple Account, 3rd party certificate or Shared enterprise certificate. If you are changing from one method to another, you need to remove and install your apps again. You can do it from Installation history.
Scroll down to see comparison of all methods.
FREE_ENTERPRISE_SIDELOADING_DISADVANTAGE: Apps stop to work after few days, JIT is not supported, frequent app reinstallation is required
LINK_DEVICE_BACKUP_OPTION: If your device is not able to scan QR code, please enter email that you used to link your device to appdb
P2P_CHAT_COMMUNICATION_NOTICE: Any conversation outside of this chat cannot be used as proof of communication between you and the developer account owner
HOW_WOULD_YOU_LIKE_TO_REPLY: How would you like to reply to this comment?
FAILED_TO_MARK_MESSAGE_AS_READ: Failed to mark message as read
PRIVATE_COMMENT_NOTICE: Your name, device model, and OS version will be shared with the receiver.
PUBLIC_COMMENT_NOTICE: Your name, device model, and OS version will be publicly visible.
FAILED_TO_UPLOAD_IMAGE_EMPTY_RESPONSE: Failed to upload image: Empty response
